sentences.en: He had been taught to abhor people who did this wicked thing.
sentences.cn: 他曾经被教导要憎恶做这种坏事的人。

sentences.en: I hate and abhor falsehood but I love your law.
sentences.cn: 谎话是我所恨恶所憎嫌的。惟你的律法，是我所爱的。

sentences.en: Do not abhor an Edomite, for he is your brother.
sentences.cn: 不可憎恶以东人，因为他是你的弟兄。
